description: Want to know the current weather information or flight rules for a particular airport?  Just ask Aviation Weather!  You'll get the airports' current detailed METAR or the current Flight Category (VFR, MVFR, IFR, LIFR)  depending on what you ask for.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Aviation Weather what is the metar for KSMO
Alexa, ask Aviation Weather for the weather for KLAX
Alexa, tell Aviation Weather to get me the flight category for KPSP
name: Aviation Weather Brief
